statements: SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(treatment)) AS avg_treatment_length FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date, DATE_PART('year', AGE(birth_date)) AS age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(diagnosis) AS diagnosis_count FROM patients GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patients WHERE treatment IS NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL AND treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, DATE_PART('year', AGE(birth_date)) AS age, birth_date FROM patients WHERE DATE_PART('year', AGE(birth_date)) > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY birth_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, CONCAT('Patient ', patient_id) AS patient_identifier FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, DATE_PART('month', admission_date) AS admission_month FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients WHERE diagnosis ILIKE 'cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, DATE_PART('hour', admission_date) AS admission_hour FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date, CASE WHEN gender = 'Male' THEN 'Mr.' ELSE 'Ms.' END AS title FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment, DATE_PART('year', AGE(admission_date)) AS admission_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, birth_date FROM patients ORDER BY birth_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM patients WHERE admission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM patients GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM patients WHERE treatment IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, admission_date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS days_admitted FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth_date, CURRENT_DATE)) AS average_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IN ('Flu', 'Cold', 'Fever');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, birth_date, admission_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND YEAR(admission_date) = 2021;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patients WHERE admission_date < '2022-01-01' AND (diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' OR treatment LIKE '%antibiotics%');
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, admission_date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS months_admitted FROM patients;
SELECT gender, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth_date, CURRENT_DATE)) AS average_age FROM patients GROUP BY gender ORDER BY gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT medical_condition, date_recorded FROM medical_records;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, medical_condition FROM medical_records WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients RIGHT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, date_recorded FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE patients.age >= 35;

SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, date_recorded FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%cancer%' AND patients.gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, date_recorded FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM patients;
SELECT MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT DISTINCT medical_condition FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE age < 30 AND gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, date_recorded FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE medical_condition='Diabetes';
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, date_recorded FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT patient_id, CASE WHEN gender='Male' THEN 'M' ELSE 'F' END AS gender_abbr FROM patients;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS num_patients FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, age HAVING num_records > 2;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(age) AS avg_age, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING avg_age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, age, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, age ORDER BY num_records DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, medical_condition FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE (age < 25 AND medical_condition='Flu') OR (age >= 60 AND medical_condition='Hypertension');

SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE gender='Male' GROUP BY patient_name, medical_condition HAVING num_records > 1;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription, date_created FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, age, gender, height, weight FROM patients WHERE weight < 70;
SELECT id, name, age, gender, height, weight FROM patients WHERE height BETWEEN 150 AND 170;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, doctor FROM appointments WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE prescription LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age <= 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT appointment_date, doctor, reason FROM appointments WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, age, gender, height, weight FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT id, name, age, gender, height, weight FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND age < 50;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, doctor FROM appointments WHERE outcome = 'Complete';
SELECT name, age, doctor, reason FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patients.name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id;

SELECT patients.name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients RIGHT JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id;

SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(weight) AS avg_weight FROM patients;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM patients;
SELECT patients.name, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patients.name;
SELECT patients.name, MAX(appointments.appointment_date) AS last_appointment FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patients.name;
SELECT doctor, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT patients.name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patients.name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;

SELECT patients.name, medical_records.diagnosis, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.id = medical_records.patient_id INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.reason = 'Check-up' AND medical_records.diagnosis = 'Normal';
SELECT patients.name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.outcome IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT doctor FROM appointments;

SELECT patients.name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.doctor FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > (SELECT date('now'));
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT trial_name, description FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT trial_name, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE treatment != 'None';
SELECT trial_name, description FROM clinical_trials WHERE description LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT trial_name, start_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE research_type = 'Genetics';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE end_date < start_date;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patients.patient_name, clinical_trials.trial_name FROM patients JOIN clinical_trials ON patients.patient_id = clinical_trials.trial_id;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, CASE WHEN gender = 'Male' THEN 'M' ELSE 'F' END AS gender_short FROM patients;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, research_type FROM research_data WHERE research_type LIKE '%Genetics%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING record_count > 5;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%CA%';
SELECT patient_id, MAX(date_created) AS latest_record FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis IS NULL;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(LENGTH(treatment)) AS avg_treatment_length FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT trial_id, COUNT(*) AS participant_count FROM clinical_trials JOIN research_data ON clinical_trials.trial_id = research_data.trial_id GROUP BY trial_id;
SELECT data_id, research_type, data FROM research_data WHERE LENGTH(data) > 10000;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, CONCAT(patient_name, ' - ', gender) AS patient_info FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS research_count FROM research_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING research_count > 1;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, COUNT(*) AS participant_count FROM clinical_trials JOIN research_data ON clinical_trials.trial_id = research_data.trial_id GROUP BY trial_id HAVING participant_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' AND date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientVisits;
SELECT visit_id, patient_id, visit_date FROM PatientVisits WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT visit_id, patient_id, visit_date, diagnosis FROM PatientVisits WHERE prescription IS NULL;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM PatientVisits WHERE visit_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory;
SELECT history_id, patient_id, condition, start_date FROM MedicalHistory WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT condition, start_date FROM MedicalHistory WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LabResults;
SELECT result_id, visit_id, test_name, result FROM LabResults WHERE result_date = '2021-06-15';
SELECT test_name, result FROM LabResults WHERE result_date > '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ResearchData;
SELECT research_id, patient_id, data_type, data_value FROM ResearchData WHERE record_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM ResearchData WHERE patient_id = 'abc123';
SELECT patient_id, record_date FROM ResearchData WHERE data_type='vital_signs';
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id;

SELECT PatientVisits.patient_id, Patients.patient_name, PatientVisits.visit_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id WHERE PatientVisits.diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, PatientVisits.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, LabResults.test_name FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON PatientVisits.visit_id = LabResults.visit_id;
SELECT DISTINCT Patients.patient_name, PatientVisits.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, COUNT(PatientVisits.visit_id) AS num_visits FROM Patients LEFT JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.condition FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT CONCAT(patient_name, ' - ', address) AS patient_details FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, prescription FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id WHERE PatientVisits.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, data_type, data_value->>'blood_pressure' AS blood_pressure FROM Patients JOIN ResearchData ON Patients.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id WHERE data_type='Vital Signs';

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, result FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON PatientVisits.visit_id = LabResults.visit_id WHERE result='Negative';
SELECT patient_name, end_date - start_date AS duration FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, AVG(result) AS avg_result FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON PatientVisits.visit_id = LabResults.visit_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(DISTINCT data_type) AS num_data_types FROM Patients JOIN ResearchData ON Patients.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, result_date FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON PatientVisits.visit_id = LabResults.visit_id WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, MIN(result) AS min_result, MAX(result) AS max_result FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON PatientVisits.visit_id = LabResults.visit_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(data_value->'allergies') AS allergy FROM Patients JOIN ResearchData ON Patients.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id WHERE data_type='Allergies';
SELECT patient_name, gender, COUNT(visit_id) AS num_visits FROM Patients LEFT JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, gender;
SELECT patient_name, condition, end_date - start_date AS duration FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, prescription, result_date FROM Patients JOIN PatientVisits ON Patients.patient_id = PatientVisits.patient_id JOIN LabResults ON PatientVisits.visit_id = LabResults.visit_id WHERE prescription LIKE '%antibiotic%' AND result='Positive';
